Identifies in Linux (via '''pccardctl ident''') as... 
Socket 0:
  product info: "BreezeCOM
", "BreezeNET PC-Card
", "Version 4.4.07 990608
", ""
  manfid: 0x0a02, 0x0102
  function: 6 (network)
